text: Phytophthora iranica is a plant pathogen that infects the roots of the Myrtle plants. It was discovered in a commercial nursery in Sardinia, Italy. ISSN 0191-2917 http://www.apsnet.org/pd/PDFS/1993/PlantDisease77n10_1050.pdf The fungus causes a blight on the plant, effectively destroying it. ==References== Category:Fungal diseases
title: Phytophthora iranica
